Title: Allows geriatricians to apply for both the physician loan repayment program and the physician practice support program
Summary: Allows geriatricians to apply for both the physician loan repayment program and the physician practice support program, provided such geriatrician agrees to practice geriatrics for at least 5 years.
LawCode: Amd ยง2807-m, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to allowing geriatricians to apply for both the physician loan repayment program and the physician practice support program
